titleStmt.title: Variants of the bound pronoun 3rd person singular masculine after a vowel
titleStmt.author: Veronika Engler

sourceDesc.p: This is the feature-file for the 3rd person singular masculine bound pronoun after a vowel.

revisionDesc.change: For EGY-___ there are no values found

item.label: last vowel is long, stressed and raised (a - e, o - u, e - i)

cit.quote: in him, by him, with him

wib:featureValueObservation.note: The h is often inaudible when in pause.
Assimilation of h occurs for instance in ma ramēnāšši 'we did not throw it (m.sg.)'.
The h is often inaudible when in pause.
The h is often inaudible when in pause.
he h is often inaudible when in pause.
